thread.title: Ex-NBA coaches Jerry Sloan, Tom Thibodeau hang out at Jazz game (PHOTO)
thread.title_full: Ex-NBA coaches Jerry Sloan, Tom Thibodeau hang out at Jazz game (PHOTO)

title: Ex-NBA coaches Jerry Sloan, Tom Thibodeau hang out at Jazz game (PHOTO)
text:
Ex-NBA coaches Jerry Sloan, Tom Thibodeau hang out at Jazz game (PHOTO) FOX Sports 
Oct 13, 2015 at 11:54a ET + 
There's nothing on this planet that can keep Tom Thibodeau from being involved in the NBA. Jeff Hanisch / USA TODAY Sports FOX Sports Updated Oct 13, 2015 at 11:54a ET 
You can take Tom Thibodeau and Jerry Sloan out of the NBA. But you can't take the NBA out of this Tom & Jerry duo. Thibodeau and Sloan were spotted in the stands of a Utah Jazz preseason game on Monday: true Just two former NBA coaches who've been fired by the Bulls chilling at a preseason game in Utah. (photo @lairddoman ) pic.twitter.com/RMOU5pQa4i â€” Jody Genessy (@DJJazzyJody) October 13, 2015 
The photo is appropriately grainy. These are two NBA coaching legends who have dipped out of the public eye, occasionally blessing us with glimpses of their presence at various basketball events. 
That's right: collectively, this coaching pair is the NBA's Bigfoot. MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our NBA newsletters.
